scripts.electron:dev: npm run build && npm run electron:compile && electron .
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:build:all: npm run build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --mac --win
scripts.build:mobile: mv src/app/api/transactions/\[id\] src/app/api/transactions/_id_disabled 2>/dev/null || true && BUILD_TARGET=mobile next build; mv src/app/api/transactions/_id_disabled src/app/api/transactions/\[id\] 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.mobile:android: npm run build:mobile && npm run cap:sync android && npm run cap:run:android
